root.name: Dragon Ball Z: Tenkaichi Tag Team
root.description: Filled with authentic scenes and countless missions from the anime its based on, Dragon Ball Z: Tenkaichi Tag Team follows the original Dragon Ball story from the Saiyan Saga to the Majin Buu Saga. This time, Tenkaichi Tag Team lets up to four players team up for 2 vs 2 tag team battles via the PSP Networking System. Alongside the two fiery battle modes, other new gameplay features include the "Dragon Water Mode" which lets players jump straight into a fight with enemies they encounter.

similar_games.game: Dragon Ball Z: Shin Budokai - Another Road
